p: The selected medicines were obtained from the Product Development Department of the Institute. Two grams each of IK (Batch No. 198339), VG (Batch No. 193083), and MMG (Batch No. 194967) were sonicated with chromatographic grade methanol in an ultra-sound bath (Labnet Scientific, India) for 20 min. It was then filtered through a membrane filter (0.45 μm) and kept under the refrigerator until HPTLC analysis.
